65.eng-name: Prophetic Commentary on the Qur'an (Tafseer of the Prophet (pbuh))

hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah:(regarding the revelation) Truly he (Muhammad) did see of the signs of his Lord; the Greatest!' (53.18) The Prophet (ﷺ) saw a green screen covering the horizon

chapter.ara-name: باب {لَقَدْ رَأَى مِنْ آيَاتِ رَبِّهِ الْكُبْرَى}
chapter.eng-name: "Indeed he (Muḥammad ﷺ) did see of the Greatest Signs of his Lord (Allah)." (V.53:18)
